subject: Learn more about an online education
body:
Did you know that a college degree can result in over a million dollars of extra income! Lifetime earning of a high school grad are $1.2mil, a four year college grad are $2.1mil and a grad school graduate are $4.4mil. Increase your lifetime earnings by finishing your college degree.

(Source: U.S. Census Bureau Population Surveys, March 98, 99, and 2000)
